import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { PictureService } from 'src/app/services/picture.service'; import { Picture } from 'src/app/shared/models/Pictures'; @Component({ selector: 'app-picture-page', templateUrl: './picture-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./picture-page.component.css'] }) export class PicturePageComponent implements OnInit { pictures: Picture[] = []; constructor(private pictureService: PictureService, private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit() { this.pictureService.findAll().subscribe(data => { this.pictures = data; }); } fetchUrlContent(picture: Picture) { const apiUrl = `http://localhost:8080/api/v1/pictures/${picture.id}`; this.http.get(apiUrl).subscribe( response => { picture.url = response.url; }, error => { console.error(error); } ); } }
